OP subset, precip
```{r}
load("./output/out_OP_precip.rdata")
post_precip <- rstan::extract(out)
cbind(sapply(post_precip, mean), 
      t(sapply(post_precip, quantile, probs = c(0.025, 0.975))) )
```

OP subset, cloud

OP, cloud w/ interaction
```{r}
load("./output/out_OP_wx_cloud_full.rdata")
post_wx_cloud <- rstan::extract(out)
plot(out, pars = c("a", "b", "c", "d", "sigma_obs", "sigma_ind", "sigma_t"))
cbind(sapply(post_wx_cloud, mean), 
      t(sapply(post_wx_cloud, quantile, probs = c(0.025, 0.975))) )
```
